data.name: Never Out Of Time
data.detailed_description:
« Never Out Of Time » is a bullet-hell/danmaku type of shoot ’em up where you go through levels in which you have to face multiple enemies shooting massive amounts of bullets at you, while having a single life... but there is a twist : You can control the flow of time at will.

This game wants to offer a change of pace from the classic shoot 'em up experience which tests your reflexes and your ability to memorize patterns. In Never Out Of Time, you'll be able to slow down time to a stop and even rewind the last few seconds whenever you want in order to better analyze the patterns thrown at you, thread the needle, and try another approach if needed.

Key Features

  • A classic bullet hell experience with a new approach.
  • Thousands of bullets for beautiful and contemplative (but still deadly!) patterns.
  • Relative time : if you stop, the game comes to a halt, and if you move slowly so does the game. Music is also affected in a way!
  • Time rewind : you can rewind the last few seconds of action at will.
  • A big space station to explore through 7 extensive levels with many complex patterns to master and enemies to destroy (there are checkpoints).
  • A complete and interactive (but optional) tutorial level to get the feel of the gameplay if you need to.
  • Many secret challenges to trigger in each level, which drastically change enemies behaviors and patterns.
  • Detailed scoring system (killed enemies, real timer, relative timer, grazed bullets, etc) with multiple leaderboards so you can compete in the category that suits you.
  • Patterns are for the most part designed with the speed-running aspect in mind. A seasoned player should be able to minimize his use of the time control and rush through levels at relatively high speed.
  • Controller support.

What to expect of the free demo

  • Polished and mostly final graphics, environment, gameplay and level design.
  • Full access to the first level and its secrets challenges.
  • Tutorial level to learn about the controls and the gameplay.
  • Local scoring (online leaderboards will come later).
  • Mouse+Keyboard and gamepad support.
  • A few rough edges here and there.
  • English only in game at the moment.

Please do share with us any bug, issue or feedback you may have. This will help us tremendously to make a clean final release.

data.short_description: Survive in an ocean of bullets by dodging, shooting at your foes and manipulating time. You can take as much time as you need and even "do over": YOU set the tempo of the action. Will you be able to conquer the space station?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 core / 4 threads @2.0 GHZ CPU 32bits
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 920M or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 core / 4 threads @2.0 GHZ CPU 64 bits
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
